description: A Rusty Nail is a fascinating drink that’s made when you mix Drambuie and Scotch&nbsp;whisky. You can serve it in an old-fashioned glass or even up the stemware if desired! It goes best over ice, so be sure to add some before serving yourself any.
name: Rusty Nail

recipeInstructions.name: Add the scotch and Drambuie into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well-chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the scotch and Drambuie into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well-chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a rocks glass over one large ice cube.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a rocks glass over one large ice cube.
